p: J.L. developed the index P theory. P.N.P. demonstrated the theory in the first case studies. J.L., C.J.V.A. and N.R.F. planned the development of the R‐package. J.L. and U.O. curated the data, coded the R‐package, performed the experiments and wrote the manuscript. J.T. supervised the Honduras case study and provided essential data sources. All authors tested the code, and revised both the examples and manuscript text.
